forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. North wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens, Downtown San Francisco embraces a cloak of clouds with a soft whisper of moisture lingering in the air. A chance of rain stirs after the clock strikes one, with the temperature resting comfortably around fifty. The breeze whispers from the north, gentle yet persistent, hinting at the chill to come. The chance of precipitation drifts around forty percent tonight, promising possibly less than a tenth of an inch—a mere teasing of the sky’s abundance.

As dawn approaches, Wednesday greets us with a mix of hazy sunlight and intermittent rain. The high will flirt around fifty-seven before cascading into the cooler embrace of afternoon, falling to about fifty-three. The northwest winds may dance with some vigor, gusting to twenty-two miles per hour, adding a brisk sharpness to the day’s interplay of sun and shadow. One might find the streets a little slippery underfoot, as new rainfall amounts are predicted to gather between a tenth and a quarter of an inch. As the brisk chill permeates, it is prudent to layer—a light sweater under a water-resistant jacket would serve well, perhaps topped with a scarf to shield against the playful wind.

Amidst the shifting tides of weather, one might choose a warm beverage from a cozy café, watching the world pass by through rain-specked windows. Alternatively, a stroll through the city's hilly streets could provide a backdrop of stunning grey-tinged silhouettes, where the iconic landmarks stand defiantly against the encroaching mist. Whether tucked away with a good book or discovering hidden corners in the vibrant city, today invites exploratory spirits to embrace its mellow charm and transient beauty.
